sentences.en: Because it is carried by a dominant gene, an affected individual can expect about half of his or her children to inherit the illness.
sentences.cn: 因为它是由显性基因携带，所以感染者的孩子会有约50％的可能性遗传该疾病。

sentences.en: Children who are illegitimate can nevertheless inherit from their parents.
sentences.cn: 然而私生子能从他们父母那里继承遗产.

sentences.en: Even dear Mr. Godfrey partakes of the fallen nature which we all inherit from Adam.
sentences.cn: 就连可敬的高孚利先生,也有我们从亚当身上继承来的那种堕落本性.

sentences.en: Good as it is to inherit a library, it is better to collect one.
sentences.cn: 继承藏书虽好, 收集藏书更有意义.

sentences.en: He intended that his son should inherit his business.
sentences.cn: 他打算让他的儿子继承他的生意.

sentences.en: Her favorite Beatitude is " Blessed are the meek for they shall inherit the earth ".
sentences.cn: 她最喜欢的至福是 “ 保佑温顺的人,他们将继承土地 ”.

sentences.en: I inherited my mother’s curly hair.
In the event of his death Sheila will inherit the money.
sentences.cn: 一旦他故去,希拉就会继承这笔钱.

sentences.en: The eldest son will inherit the title.
The meek shall inherit the earth.
The newly - formed variety would probably inherit from its progenitor some characteristic.
sentences.cn: 新形成的变种或许会从它的祖先遗传来某些特性的差异.

sentences.en: The strong, the strong they tell us will inherit the land.
sentences.cn: 强者, 他们所谓的强者将继承这块土地.

sentences.en: They are to inherit 100,000 US dollars.
We inherit from our parents many of our physical characteristics.
sentences.cn: 我们的许多身体特征都是从父母那里遗传而来的。

sentences.en: We must inherit in a critical way.
sentences.cn: 我们要以批判的方式继承.

sentences.en: Widows have the right to dispose of property they inherit, without interference from anyone.
sentences.cn: 丧偶妇女有权处分继承的财产, 任何人不得不干涉.
